issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. To reproduce
1. Install and launch KS on iOS device
2. Navigate to Phone> Contacts> Groups
3. Add person (in case no people are in the group)
h5. Actual result
Contacts are partially hidden behind the picker
h5. Expected result
All contacts should be visible
fields.summary: iOS Kitchen Sink:Phone - Contacts - Groups - added contacts are hidden behind the picker
fields.environment:
Mac osx 10.9.5 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409261245
Titanium SDK, build: 3.4.0.GA
acs@1.0.18
alloy 1.5.0
install@0.1.7
npm@1.4.23
sudo@1.0.3
titanium 3.4.0
titanium-code-processor@1.1.1
Xcode6.1GM
Devices:
iPhone 6 iOS 8.1

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
